<Heading

  className={"openapi__heading"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v2/pix/dict/policy/{policy}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Gets the current state of the participant bucket for the entered policy.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
